interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: JIADEL Gel Nail Polish Colors Set,Confetti Glitter Gel Nail Polish With No Wipe Base and Top Coat,Soak Off UV LED Nail Art Salon Starter Manicure Kit
Review Date: 2021/03/07
Store: JIADEL
Average Rating: 3.9
Product Details: {'Brand': 'JIADEL', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Type': 'Gel', 'Finish Type': 'Shimmery', 'Material Feature': 'Non-Toxic, Cruelty Free', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '1 Count', 'Number of Items': '16', 'Liquid Volume': '0.17 Fluid Ounces', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '11 x 9 x 1 inches', 'Product Dimensions': '11 x 9 x 1 inches; 1.34 Pounds', 'UPC': '642940399488'}
Review Text: Packaging is nice love how the bottles shows what color of the polish your picking.  Nice color glitter polish however they are not long lasting.  I did my nails in both matte and gloss look and within two days my nails with the gloss top coat peeled off.  My base and top coat bottles were relabeled so I don't know if that had something to do with it or not.  The nail polish is thick because the glitter so you will need to give it a good shake or tap it a bit in your palm.
Review Title: Nice colors very small bottles
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Qiray Hair Ties For Women Coil Hair Ties,Large Lace Phnom Penh,5 Colors 10 Pieces.
Qiray
{'Material': 'Rubber', 'Item Form': 'elastic', 'Brand': 'Qiray', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '3.15 x 3.15 x 2.36 inches', 'Number of Pieces': '10', 'Product Dimensions': '3.15 x 3.15 x 2.36 inches; 2.82 Ounces', 'UPC': '655160582486'}
Very pretty, they have a good stretch depending you your hairstyle you may twist twice.  You get two of each color.  The only thing I did not like is that these hair ties have a paint smell to them so wash them before wearing them.
Good
STYLEAGAL Portable Electric Nail Drill, Manicure Pedicure Drill Kit Professional nail starter kit for beginners acrylic with drill（2020 Upgraded）
styleagal
{'Brand': 'styleagal', 'Voltage': '5 Volts', 'Power Source': 'Battery Powered', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '7.8 x 4.5 x 2 inches; 8.01 Ounces', 'UPC': '782913461771', 'Manufacturer': 'STYLEAGAL'}
[[VIDEOID:c1d81e3cfad618ed65e971a49ab65264]] This is a nice drill great for beginners.  Just take some practice to get good at using it on your self and others hand.  The power cord is not long enough and the drill bits is hard to push them in and to pull out.  If you have never used a drill start working with the lower speed first.
Works very well
Pretty Frank Natural Deodorant Jar- No Aluminum Deodorant for Women, Men, Teens, & Kids – Paraben Sulfate Free Cream Deodorant with Shea Butter, Coconut Oil, Vitamin E & Baking Soda (Jasmine)
PRETTY FRANK
{'Brand': 'PRETTY FRANK', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Scent': 'Jasmine, Coconut', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '3.42 x 2.79 x 2.59 inches; 5.61 Ounces'}
I like the fact that its organic and made in the US. However, this is not a deodorant for someone who is on the move. I do have sweaty underarms and I had to clean my armpits and apply this several times a day to be dry.  I don't like that I have to put this on with my fingers.  I was dry long as I wasn't moving around to much and in a cool place.  The jasmine scent is wonderful.  It is a small jar but you get a lot.
Not for me
YsesoAi 28 Pcs Hair Curlers Spiral Curls No Heat Wave Hair Curlers Styling Kit Spiral Hair Curlers Magic Hair Rollers with 2 Pieces Styling Hooks for Most Kinds of Hairstyles (20 cm/ 7.8 inches)
YsesoAi
{'Hair Type': 'Curly', 'Brand': 'YsesoAi', 'Color': 'Pink, Blue, Ivory, Yellow, Green', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '1.5 x 1.7 x 1.1 inches', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Product Dimensions': '1.5 x 1.7 x 1.1 inches; 6.38 Ounces', 'UPC': '745895771436'}
My hair is naturally curly so , I wanted to see how it would do on a blowout.  I like the curly pattern that it creates the only problem I had was my hair was to long for this, pulling your hair threw with the hook that's given was easy. It did not hurt to pull your hair threw the spiral curlers.
Short Hair Only
AMAJULIE Non Slip Flexible Silicon Wigs Fix Strong Hold Comfort Silicone Lace Wig Grip Transparent Headband Hair Band Adjustable for Lace Wigs (Light Brown)
AMAJULIE
{'Material': 'Silicone', 'Fabric Type': 'Silicone,Silicon,Lace', 'Brand': 'AMAJULIE', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '3.98 x 2.28 x 0.55 inches; 0.88 Ounces', 'UPC': '192389741275'}
I love this thing, it's very comfortable and has nice snug fit.  It's not to tight and the ridges are on the top and bottom so it stays on your head and grips the lace on the wig.  You don't see the grip under your lace, this thing really keeps your wig on.  You must be wearing a Lace Front wig for it to work.
My new friend
Glitter Poly Nail Gel Extensions Builder Gel UV/LED Soak Off Acrylic Fashion Gel Polish Set for Nails Beginner DIY Nail Art at Home 8 colors-15g (Pink series)
MIZHSE
{'Brand': 'MIZHSE', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Finish Type': 'Shimmery', 'Material Feature': 'Non-Toxic, Cruelty Free', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '478.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '9', 'Package Dimensions': '9.76 x 4.88 x 1.42 inches; 12.8 Ounces'}
This kit only comes with the poly gel, nail forms and a free gift. You will need your own tools to apply. I love this formula, very easy work with it doesn’t dry fast so you have to build or layer. What I like the most that after putting under the lamp your nails don’t have that tacky layer.  So the poly gel is sheer but building as in adding more will make it thicker.  I also like the nail forms.
The best I’ve used so far
7pcs Pearl Hair Clips Large Hair Clips Pins Barrette Ties Hair Headwear Barrette for Party Wedding Daily, Gift for Girls and Women
MEETWIN
{'Package Dimensions': '7.5 x 3.5 x 0.2 inches; 1.76 Ounces', 'UPC': '723668014119'}
These are very pretty to jazz up your hairstyle. I love the big clips very easy to open and close also holds a of hair. None of the pearls were scratch or peeling. Definitely worth getting.
Beautiful Pearl accessories
Curly Girl Hair Spray Bottle – Ultra Fine Extended Water Mister for Curly Hairstyling, Care and Moisturizing (10 Fl. Oz. & 24 Fl. Oz Set, Swirls White Top)
Curly Girl
{'Brand': 'Curly Girl', 'Color': 'Swirls White Top', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Special Feature': 'Mist Spray', 'Product Care Instructions': 'Hand Wash Only', 'Package Dimensions': '11.06 x 6.14 x 3.39 inches; 6.74 Ounces', 'UPC': '853356005850', 'Manufacturer': 'Curly Girl'}
[[VIDEOID:7fc8bfe19a29a244cf5bea86c34ad870]] I absolutely love this bottle.  With the mist spray water isn’t dripping everywhere. I don’t have to keep refilling it up every day like I do with the regular spray bottle. Every easy to use just fill up with water put on the nozzle and spray where you like.
Every curly hair girl or guy needs this!
Short Bob Wig Human Hair Pixie Cut Wigs Natural Color Lace Wigs 100% Virgin Huam Hair Lace Front Side Part Wigs for Women
MarchQueen
{'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Style': 'Modern', 'Special Feature': 'Glueless', 'Brand': 'MarchQueen', 'Package Dimensions': '12.64 x 8.86 x 2.05 inches; 5.61 Ounces', 'UPC': '779303841725'}
Such a cute wig the hair wasn't soft as I thought it was be but its very nice.  Earrings and wig cap came with the bob wig, no smell, lightweight, and little to no shedding.  Very easy to install nice short cut cute for a quick look on the go and or summer style.
So Cute !
JIADEL Gel Nail Polish Colors Set,Confetti Glitter Gel Nail Polish With No Wipe Base and Top Coat,Soak Off UV LED Nail Art Salon Starter Manicure Kit
JIADEL

profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Focus**: The user continues to emphasize the use of versatile beauty tools, particularly in hair care, evidenced by their recent acquisition of a wig. This aligns with their desire for innovative solutions that provide quick, stylish hair options.

- **Aesthetic Preferences**: Vibrant colors and unique designs remain significant to the user, who seeks accessories that blend functionality with visual appeal. Their interest includes products that support creative expression while maintaining a fashionable aesthetic.

- **Functionality**: Ease of use is paramount, as the user favors items that simplify their beauty routine. Their latest experience highlights a preference for products that may be visually striking yet need to perform effectively and withstand daily wear.

- **Quality Assessment**: The user maintains a discerning eye for quality, valuing durability and performance in beauty products. Their reviews reflect a thoughtful evaluation of item longevity and effectiveness, with expectations of high standards.

- **Sensory Awareness**: The user continues to prioritize beauty tools that complement an active lifestyle, appreciating functionality alongside creative potential.

- **Buying Habit**: Their purchasing decisions illustrate a blend of elegance and practicality, showcasing an ongoing interest in unique and functional accessories. The recent review indicates an awareness of product shortcomings while still seeking appealing and innovative options for enhancing personal style.
